verses.name: Acts 13:23
verses.text: Of this man’s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour, Jesus:

verses.name: Acts 13:24
verses.text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel.

verses.name: Acts 13:25
verses.text: And as John fulfilled his course, he said, Whom think ye that I am? I am not he. But, behold, there cometh one after me, whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose.

verses.name: Acts 13:26
verses.text: Men and brethren, children of the stock of Abraham, and whosoever among you feareth God, to you is the word of this salvation sent.
